sentences: Atul Gautam (Nepali: अतुल गौतम) (1973 – 16 January 2005) was a talented Tabla Maestro of Nepal, born in 1973.
He was a representative of the Kavi Prasad Gautam family who started endless 24 hours HARERAMA KIRTAN in Nepal 1929 AD.
He died leaving his disciples Parsuram Poudel, Ananta Prajapati, Nabin Neupane, Santosh Verma, Madhusudan and others during 2005 due to a brain haemmorhage in Kathmandu.
